entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 14.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
